using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.Events;

/// <summary>
/// MonoBehaviour that listens to a ScriptableObject EventChannel and invokes a UnityEvent.
/// Attach to any GameObject to respond to events without direct references.
/// Generated by Unity-AI-Forge.
/// </summary>
public class {{CLASS_NAME}} : MonoBehaviour
{
    [Header("Channel")]
    [SerializeField] private {{CHANNEL_CLASS_NAME}} channel;

    [Header("Response")]
    public UnityEvent{{EVENT_TYPE_GENERIC}} OnEventRaised;

    private void OnEnable()
    {
        if (channel != null)
            channel.Register(OnRaised);
    }

    private void OnDisable()
    {
        if (channel != null)
            channel.Unregister(OnRaised);
    }

    private void OnRaised({{EVENT_TYPE_PARAM}})
    {
        OnEventRaised?.Invoke({{EVENT_TYPE_ARG}});
    }
}
